website_summaries.verdict: An award-winning model that offers the features and functions that hunters prefer in a crossbow.
pros: Durable build and reliable performance put the TenPoint at the top of our list
Comprehensive package includes a scope, arrows, quiver, and mount
Recognized as the winner of the 2016 Game & Fish Reader's Choice Award
cons: Though rare, occasional crossbows arrived damaged

customer_reviews.title: Horrible experience. Waste of 800 dollars
customer_reviews.text: Came damaged. I didn't use it or even see this because I didn't take it out of the box for two months. The trigger is broken. You can see it cracked on the inside,and since its been past the return date I'm stuck with a broken pos crossbow.

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping. Quality bow, exactly what can be ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Quality bow, exactly what can be expected from TenPoint. Dead on out of the box. ACU 50 is a home run no lost cocking rope.
customer_reviews.author: Frank P

customer_reviews.title: No reply from the seller BACKWOODS and AMAZON
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this unit on 8/16/19..Sighted it in at 40 yds..worked great..then wennt hunting and on the second trip..while cocking it..cocking sting breaks..drove 215 miles only to have the very costly TenPoint Turbo GT break..I have been trying to contact AMAZON and BACKWOODS to get a NEW ACU cocking device. TenPOINT wants to send me another string...NO NO NO..I use large string on my deep sea reels..what a joke!!
customer_reviews.author: wdc

customer_reviews.title: Well made reliable ' precision ' it was on right out of the box'
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of there cross bows and love both I just purchased the turbo GT this summer and harvested an 11 point on opener a week ago' if you want a well made reliable accurate cross bow don't kid yourself 10 point is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Frank cat

customer_reviews.title: This bow ROCKS!
customer_reviews.text: I have hunted with compound bows for years and finally decided to try a crossbow. I am impressed how accurate it is right out of the box. Just a little fine tuning and i was shooting 2" groups from 60 yards. The bow comes as a kit with a scope and 3 bolts and a built in rope cocker. Extremely easy to load and shoot. From reading some of the other reviews, there were complaints about the scope, but i wouldn't change anything on this bow. I probably will invest in some lighted nocks though. Can't wait for October.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Goddard

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, Powerful, but Noisy
customer_reviews.text: Groups ~2" at 35 yards, but noisy even after installation of silencer kit. Also stripped a bolt during installation of the foot bracket. Will advise later if noise level is high enough to cause deer to jump the string ...
customer_reviews.author: Harold Harder

customer_reviews.title: Best Crossbow I have owned.
customer_reviews.text: Best Crossbow I ever shot. Its Smooth, quiet and most of all Accurate. Don't shoot the same dot at 30 yards unless you want to buy a lot of bolts. Season starts Saturday, can't wait to give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Fortrl

customer_reviews.title: Sharp Shooting Crossbow
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate crossbow! Using a rifle sand bag on a rest, I was able to hit a 2 inch bullseye at 20 to 50 yards. Great bow with little recoil. Have shot about 300 shots and the string is holding up well, except for some minor serving fray. Highly recommend this bow. I had a Titan M-1 which a returned since it quickly chewed up bowstrings.
customer_reviews.author: His Humble Servant

customer_reviews.title: Ten Point Turbo Gt
customer_reviews.text: Packaged well and Fast shipping! Totally awesome crossbow! Soooo easy to cock and dead on target. I also purchased the Ten Point universal limb dampeners & string noise dampening system SDS. Was a great purchase price too. Highly reccomend to others! Thanks Seller
customer_reviews.author: Debbie S.

customer_reviews.title: Shoulda bought this long ago
customer_reviews.text: The Turbo GT is a beast. After a few shots to dial it in this thing is dead on both right AND left handed. No more being turned the wrong way when that deer shows up where he’s not expected. Alittle louder than expected but at 35 yards my deer never had time to react to the shot. The acudraw also is a blessing even tho I didn’t think I needed it. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Crossbow!
customer_reviews.text: Superb crossbow! Just killed my first deer with it last night. Super accurate and powerful. It was getting dark and the scope definitely did the job so I could see the deer to shoot. If you're looking for an awesome mid-range priced xbow, you can't go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: David S. Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Buy the accudraw cocker if you are short are don't have a lot of upper body strength.
customer_reviews.text: Great item. Bought for the wife. She is hitting dimes at 50 yards. Had to buy the accudraw cocking device after initial purchase as she was unable to cock the cross bow with rope cocker. Probably would have been cheaper to purchase as a kit with accudraw cocking device already installed.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Lutz

customer_reviews.title: Super Quality Crossbow
customer_reviews.text: The crossbow was easy to assemble. Sighting in was also easy. The built in cocker is priceless and works perfectly. The crossbow has an anti-dry fire and I has a situation that made me SUPER happy that I had the device.
customer_reviews.author: nraven13

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Going from a compound to this, wow. Love it, should have bought one years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Random

customer_reviews.title: Shoots great!
customer_reviews.text: Grouped good right away. Had to move scope up some. 6th or 7th shot was bullseye at 20 yards. Will tune it in at 30 this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Mathison

customer_reviews.title: Good bow
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good bow. Me and my husband enjoy using it it definitely packs a punch and could definitely smack a deer lol
customer_reviews.author: Kayla nelson

customer_reviews.title: The bow is amazingly fast and accurate. While it ...
customer_reviews.text: The bow is amazingly fast and accurate. While it is a bit louder than a compound bow, it's speed more than compensates. I can't wait to get in to the field with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Fast, accurate and not too loud. It's a Ten Point, great quality, and made in USA!
customer_reviews.author: Hound Dog

customer_reviews.title: Tempoint Turbo GT Crossbow
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband.Great Looking Bow. He really loves it. He can’t wait to use it during bow season. Great support too.
customer_reviews.author: sremeikis

customer_reviews.title: Great Crossbow
customer_reviews.text: I turned 60 this past year which made me eligable to archery hunt with a crossbow in Minnesota. I debated the switch from my compound bow, but am very happy with the decision to go with the Tenpoint Turbo GT. Awesome bow, high quality, accurate and easy to use. The Accu Draw 50 is quick and easy to use, no need for the crank version.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very, very accurate and easy to cock.
customer_reviews.text: This crossbow is very best you can buy. It shoots darn near perfect at 20 yds. and it shoots within 2” at 50 yds. every time.
customer_reviews.author: To Much

customer_reviews.title: Love this crossbow!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don't like about 10 Point is their Knock system. Those removable inserts get lost and that's a pain. I'd ditch those in a minute. However, the bow itself is fantastic.

customer_reviews.title: It’s easy to split your bolts!!
customer_reviews.text: For the money I could be more satisfied. When sighting in the bow I only had to make a few adjustments. We had it zeroed in 3 shots. The GT is extremely accurate I’m confident out to 60 yards.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Weapon
customer_reviews.text: Got a really nice 8 point with this. Accurate as a rifle out to 40 yards, but you get the benefit a the early warm hunting season.
customer_reviews.author: K. G

customer_reviews.title: Love the crossbow
customer_reviews.text: Love the crossbow! Only problem is the scope. It doesn't light up. Tried a new battery. Still doesn't work. Left two messages to the seller. No response yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Accurate Crossbow
customer_reviews.text: Great crossbow, harvested a deer the first time I took it out and took a shot at 60 yds.
customer_reviews.author: vga

customer_reviews.title: Great crossbow
customer_reviews.text: This is my second crossbow and it's a beauty . I really like the cord cocking system. I find it very fast to use and well though out . The bow was easy to assemble and was accurate out the box . It's powerful and looks great . I did put a Nikon scope on it but the factory one works fine .
customer_reviews.author: Dstress

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little package, right on the money out of the box at 25 yards.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Franzen

customer_reviews.title: Really great crossbow.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great crossbow. The best part is the cocking device is on board. It is already sighted in which is a plus. The only negative is the lubricant is not included.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tate

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME Crossbow
customer_reviews.text: This crossbow is awesome. Cannot say enough good things about the overall quality of the Turbo GT. Very easy to shoot, get on target (smaller than other X-Bows, accurate right out of the box (3rd shot bulls-eye at 30 yards), and the 50 ACU draw is perfect. Would highly recommend this bow.
customer_reviews.author: Double MO

customer_reviews.title: Modern Technology!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered in 2 days. Followed instructions for easy assembly. ProView scope is sweet. Beautiful visibility. Black for daylight, red or green for twilight. Bore sight close right out of the box. Only had to make a few adjustments. Wicked light weight and better balance compared to my '07 Barnett Quad 400, which I will say did a great job and harvested 10 deer. But, this ACU Draw system with the claw is unbelievably simple and easy to use. 13.5" axle to axle at full draw very compact. Company recommends NAP 100g Killzone 2" expandable broadheads. Can't wait to let one fly tomorrow! Only gave it a 4 because haven't hunted with it yet!
customer_reviews.author: richard  k

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoy using my Tenpoint crossbow and love the scope it ...
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy using my Tenpoint crossbow and love the scope it came with. All four dots in the scope can be illuminated either green or red with the turn of a dial. Crossbow is very compact and light. I did not give it five stars because I was very upset with the paint on this bow. I have never purchased a weapon that scratches as easily as this one. I almost wish I purchased it in plain black so I didn't have to find a new paint chip each time I come back from hunting. Besides the shifty paint, this crossbow is great.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Ten point downs a 10 point
customer_reviews.text: Great right out of the box. Just a few minutes to put together and your practicing. In my case six days later I downed a 10 point deer. It is loud but it's so fast I don't think it matters
customer_reviews.author: Raymond I.

customer_reviews.title: Rust already
customer_reviews.text: I just got done putting everything together nice and solid, took it down to get it looked over by a professional at my local shop and he points out rust on the axles of the cams .... it’s less then 3 days old so it must of been stored somewhere damp before arriving to me. It’s a little upsetting for a $700 crossbow
customer_reviews.author: Hector.R

product_meta.title: TenPoint Turbo GT Crossbow Package with 3x Pro-View 2 Scope, 3 Pro-Elite Carbon Arrows, 3-Arrow Instant Detach Quiver, and Ambidextrous Side Quiver Mount
product_meta.description: Convenient, integrated rope cocking system. Adjustable Fusion-S stock provides match-rifle stability; XLT bow assembly includes detachable, coated aluminum foot stirrup; 11. 5" IsoTaper limbs are double laminated for added strength and durability and feature MRX cams and D-75 string and cables; ACUdraw 50 system provides convenient, integrated cocking rope that retracts after use; ACRA-ANGLE barrel eliminates finger pinching and ensures accuracy when manually drawing the crossbow; Safety engineered fore-grip and wings keep your fore-grip hand safely below the bowstring release path; Over-the-Top limb pocket/Zytel limb suspension system separates and isolates the limbs from direct contact with the riser to reduce sound and vibration; Quiet, metal-injection molded (MIM) auto-engaging safety reduces noise and auto engages while cocking; DFI dry-fire inhibitor prevents the crossbow from being fired when not loaded; 3 1/2-lb. T3 trigger with MIM action components delivers a smooth, crisp trigger pull for increased accuracy with optimum creep for safety; Machined aluminum 7/8" dovetail scope mount; Mossy Oak Break-up Country camo; Stock: Adjustable Fusion S; Velocity: 360 F. P. S. ; Energy: 109 ft. -lbs. Power Stroke: 12. 6; Draw Weight: 175-lbs. ; Axle to Axle (cocked/uncocked): 17. 5"/13. 5"; Overall Length: 35; Weight: 6. 5 lbs. ; Scope Mount: 7/8" fixed dovetail; Scope: 3x Pro-View 2; Special Features: Includes instant detach 3-Arrow Quiver, ambidextrous Side-Mount Quiver Bracket, 3-pack of TenPoint Carbon Elite Arrows with 100-grain practice points; MFG Number: DB16020-5521.
feature_bullets: WINNER of the 2016 Game & Fish Reader's Choice Award, the adjustable Fusion S stock and ultra-compact, powerful 13.5-inch XLT bow assembly form a deadly combination

Ultra compact assembly with a high performance Fusion S stock and ACRA-ANGLE barrel to DELIVER DEADLY PERFORMANCE with a power stroke of just 12.6", launching arrows up to 360 fps with a HARD-HITTING 107 ft. lbs. of kinetic energy
EVERYTHING YOU NEED TO START HUNTING: 3X Pro-View 2 Scope, 3-Arrow Instant Detach Quiver, 3 20" Pro Elite Carbon Arrows, Ambidextrous Side-Mount Quiver Bracket
ALL THE SPECS: LENGTH (w/stirrup)-35", WIDTH AXLE-TO-AXLE (uncocked/cocked)-17.5"/13.5", POWER STROKE-12.6", WEIGHT IN LBS. (wo/accessories)-6.5, DRAW WEIGHT IN LBS.-175
INTEGRATED INTO THE BUTT STOCK, ACUdraw 50 MAKES FOR EASY COCKING and ropes RETRACT NEATLY inside the unit’s housing after cocking

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
